title: Bugsplat happening again!
body: It's not letting me play. It loads just fine and lets me get through champ select but when it goes to the loading screen, it exits the loading screen before the match and a bugsplat pops up and it says, "Oops! Something broke!" Then says "LOL client has crashed" This has been happening for 2 weeks and now I have afk warnings. Please someone help me so I dont lose my account and please remove the afk.

replies.body: Well, Im losing my temper. Its not the system or computer. So, fix it please or i wont play anymore.

I cannot remove leaverbuster penalties because we cannot make any sort of modification to those. Regardless of your intention, a disconnection still negatively impacts everyone in the match.

Bugsplats are caused by a poor interaction with your system drivers or hardware, so I recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any observable change.

Just got a leaver buster punishment for reconnecting to the game after a bugsplat error. Everything was fine the game crashed and i restarted my computer. I get back into the game, we win and i get a leaver buster? What is that crap?

Edit: I have never had a "bugsplat" error until the new client... And a windows asked for permission to use the command function or something it was weird
